name: North Soorankudy Jummah Masjid
description: North Soorankudy Jummah Masjid, located in Kanyakumari district, is a significant Islamic center known for its role in community worship and cultural activities. It serves as a place of congregational prayer on Fridays (Jummah), offering spiritual guidance and fostering unity among worshippers through religious education and social initiatives. The masjid plays a vital role in preserving Islamic traditions and promoting interfaith dialogue, standing as a symbol of faith and community cohesion in the region.
location: 4CW8+9RF, Middle street, North Soorankudy, Naduvoor, Dharmapuram, Tamil Nadu 629501
